title: Antitumor Effects of Glychionide-A Flavonoid in Human Pancreatic Carcinoma Cells Are Mediated by Activation of Apoptotic and Autophagic Pathways, Cell Cycle Arrest, and Disruption of Mitochondrial Membrane Potential
